txt_en: The only safe thing is to take a chance.
txt_cn: 唯一稳妥的事是去冒险一试。
author: Elaine May

txt_en: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot.
txt_cn: 坏消息是时光飞逝，好消息是你是时光的领航员。
author: Michael Altshuler

txt_en: This universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself; everything that you want, you already are.
txt_cn: 宇宙并不在你之外。看看自己的内心吧。你想要的一切，都已尽在你身。
author: Rumi

txt_en: This universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself; everything that you want, you already are.
txt_cn: 宇宙并不在你之外。看看自己的内心吧。你想要的一切，都已尽在你身。
author: Rumi

txt_en: Character is what you know you are, not what others think you have.
txt_cn: 个性是你所了解的自己，而不是别人眼中的你。
author: Marva Collins

txt_en: The supreme happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved.
txt_cn: 人生最大的幸福，就是坚信有人爱我们。
author: Victor Hugo

txt_en: Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.
txt_cn: 即便是漫漫长夜，太阳也终将升起。
author: Victor Hugo

txt_en: Human beings can alter their lives by altering their attitude of mind.
txt_cn: 人若改变心态，便能改变生活。
author: William James

txt_en: If music be the food of love, play on.
txt_cn: 如果音乐是爱情的食粮，那就演奏下去吧。
author: William Shakespeare

txt_en: All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers.
txt_cn: 一直以来，凡成大事者都是大梦想家。
author: Orison Swett Marden

txt_en: The successful man will profit from his mistakes and try again in a different way.
txt_cn: 成功人士会从其错误中获益，然后另辟蹊径再做尝试。
author: Dale Carnegie

txt_en: High achievement always takes place in the framework of high expectation.
txt_cn: 高成就永远是在高期待的前提下产生。
author: Charles Kettering

txt_en: Luck is the sense to recognize an opportunity and the ability to take advantage of it.
txt_cn: 运气就是有意识去辨别机会，并能够利用机会。
author: Samuel Goldwyn

txt_en: Knowledge has to be improved, challenged, and increased constantly, or it vanishes.
txt_cn: 知识需要不断被改进、挑战和积累，否则将不复存在。
author: Peter Drucker

txt_en: Drama is life with the dull bits cut out.
txt_cn: 戏剧就是去掉了无聊片段的生活。
author: Alfred Hitchcock

txt_en: If we had no winter, the spring would not be so pleasant.
txt_cn: 如果没有冬天，春天就不会如此悦人。
author: Anne Bradstreet

txt_en: If you have good thoughts, they will shine out of your face like sunbeams and you will always look lovely.
txt_cn: 你若思想美好，面容就会如阳光般灿烂，看上去永远可爱迷人。
author: Roald Dahl

txt_en: Love looks through a telescope; envy, through a microscope.
txt_cn: 怀爱之人大处着眼，忌妒之人吹毛求疵。
author: Josh Billings

txt_en: Defeat is not the worst of failures. Not to have tried is the true failure.
txt_cn: 被击倒不是最大的失败，不曾尝试过才是真正的失败。
author: George E. Woodberry

txt_en: Whoever is trying to bring you down is already below you.
txt_cn: 无论是谁想要把你打倒，他都已经低你一等了。
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

txt_en: In youth we learn; in age we understand.
txt_cn: 少而学，长而知。
author: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

txt_en: High aims form high characters, and great objects bring out great minds.
txt_cn: 崇高的目标造就崇高的品格，伟大的志向造就伟大的头脑。
author: Tryon Edwards

txt_en: You've got to get up every morning with determination if you're going to go to bed with satisfaction.
txt_cn: 若想要伴着满足入睡，就必须每天带着决心起床。
author: George Horace Lorimer
